title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Threat-Modeling-As-Code - Transforming Your Threat Statements into Attack Trees
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 威胁建模即代码 - 将威胁声明转换为攻击树
abstract: Threat modeling adoption is growing, but teams hit a wall converting 'what can go wrong' into realistic threats with actionable defense strategies. The challenge? Insufficient time and knowledge. In this code talk, we'll demonstrate how ThreatForest, our Threat-Model-as-Code solution, solves this problem. We'll step through setting up automated workflows that take application context, architecture diagrams, and threat statements as inputs, then convert them into attack trees and attack steps with associated mitigation controls using AWS Threat Technique Catalog and other threat intelligence data. You'll leave with a practical framework and automation templates for making threat modeling a seamless part of your development process.
abstract_cn: 威胁建模的采用正在增长，但团队在将"可能出现的问题"转换为具有可操作防御策略的现实威胁时遇到了障碍。挑战在于时间和知识不足。在这次代码演讲中，我们将演示 ThreatForest（我们的威胁模型即代码解决方案）如何解决这个问题。我们将逐步介绍如何设置自动化工作流程，该工作流程以应用程序上下文、架构图和威胁声明作为输入，然后使用 AWS Threat Technique Catalog 和其他威胁情报数据将它们转换为攻击树和攻击步骤以及相关的缓解控制措施。您将获得一个实用的框架和自动化模板，使威胁建模成为开发过程中的无缝组成部分。
